titles.title: Patient Centered Quality Care for Life Act

A bill to create a patient-centered quality of care initiative for seriously ill patients through the establishment of a stakeholder strategic summit, quality of life education and awareness initiative, health care workforce training, an advisory committee, and palliative care focused research, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.
